title: His Professor
description: The safest place to hide from one monster is in another monster's bed.When a ghost from her past comes back to haunt her, Savannah realizes that she's in over her head. When it becomes unsafe to stay at her house, her best friend invites her to stay in one of her rental properties. Savannah's initial protests die down when she realizes that she'll be sharing a wall with her friend's gorgeous and mysterious cousin.Thomas Ingram has spent centuries alone in his home hiding behind the artistic hermit stereotype. When Savannah moves into his basement and Thomas is tasked with protecting her from a stalker, long-dormant desires are reawakened in him. But Thomas is keeping secrets, and he's not sure which one is more devastating- the fact that he's a vampire? Or the fact that he lacks sexual experience?But Savannah is more than happy to teach him how to please her, and Thomas is the most enthusiastic student she's ever had.His Professor is a vampire romance novella containing violence, explicit sex scenes, and mentions of past sexual abuse. Intended for adult readers.
author: Brigid Finn
